label: 仁壽観音
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
見出し読み: にじゅう かんのん
説明文: Also known as the futama Kannon, a statue of the Kannon bodhisattva that protected the person of the emperor. Often associated with the regalia of office, this statue was lost repeatedly, lost repeatedly. See also gojiso.
